meanings.definition: Organization: a group of people working together in a structured way for a shared purpose.
meanings.sent1: The local org helped clean up the park.
meanings.sent2: The org held a meeting to plan the charity event.
meanings.sent3: The org's bake sale was a huge success.
meanings.sent4: The org of volunteers was a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: Joining the org was a life-changing experience.

meanings.definition: Organism: a living thing, especially a single-celled or multicellular plant or animal.
meanings.sent1: The tiny org under the microscope fascinated the students.
meanings.sent2: The ocean is full of diverse orgs.
meanings.sent3: The org in the petri dish seemed to wave hello.
meanings.sent4: Each org in the ecosystem plays a vital role.
meanings.sent5: The orgs in the forest create a harmonious balance.

meanings.definition: Organic: relating to or derived from living matter.
meanings.sent1: She bought org vegetables from the farmer's market.
meanings.sent2: The org cotton used in the clothing was soft and breathable.
meanings.sent3: The org skincare products were gentle on her skin.
meanings.sent4: The chef used only org ingredients in the dish.
meanings.sent5: The org fertilizer helped the plants grow beautifully.
